title: The Orc Den (Part 2)
body:
The Orc Den (Part 2)

The area of the orc den was quite big, and they were scattered in different places.

To better clear the den Aaron and other A rank hunters instructed them to attack on the orc den from different places.

This was also one of the reasons why most of the hunters created teams.

Since they will be attacking from different places, it will be better for them to work in teams so that they can help each other if something unexpected happened.

When hunters went towards the den they started to split up to choose the perfect place to hunt orcs.

Aaron and others already gave them a summary of the den after scouting it.

They also told them about the increased numbers of the D and D+ rank orcs.

After hearing the numbers of D and D+ rank orcs increased, most of the hunters did not care and even become excited.

Most of the hunters who came here were C rank hunters.
